alert.note: Alert for Polk (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 04 at 9:40PM CDT until November 04 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Polk County in southeastern Texas... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 940 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Alabama-Coushatta Reservation, or 13 miles west of Woodville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Alabama-Coushatta Reservation. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for southeastern Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for southeastern Texas.
